lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Memphis Grizzlies, 110-104, on Friday night to match the best home start in league history with their 37th in a row.

headline.print_headline: Spurs Roll to 37-0 at Home, Tying a Season-Opening Mark
headline.main: Spurs Roll to 37-0 at Home, Tying a Season-Opening Mark

snippet: The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Memphis Grizzlies, 110-104, on Friday night to match the best home start in league history with their 37th in a row.
abstract: NBA Roundup; San Antonio Spurs defeat Memphis Grizzlies, 110-104; other basketball scores noted.
